title: Bitwise Shift Left Function
description: This function performs a bitwise left shift on a given input value based on a specified shift amount. The function calculates the result by combining a shifted constant value and the left-shifted input value.
name: SHL1

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value that will be shifted.

input.name: N
input.description: The number of positions to shift the input value to the left.

output.name: SHL1
output.description: The result of the left shift operation applied to the input value.

return_value.description: The final computed value after applying bitwise operations.
